FluoroFinder | Senior Software Engineers | Broomfield, CO | ONSITE full-time

https://www.fluorofinder.com/website/careers

FluoroFinder's tools save scientists countless hours and make designing experiments for Flow Cytometers easy. In the past, scientists would spend hours and days reading catalogs, figuring out if that marker or dye was compatible with their equipment. Now, it takes minutes when they use FluoroFinder.

Why join FluoroFinder? You will directly affect the speed at which cancer, disease, and HIV research progress. You will also get to work with a team that loves science and loves building awesome software. Most of all, you'll leave work knowing you accomplished something important.

Our platform is built with Ruby on Rails and PostgreSQL. If you have a skill set that matches, contact me directly at jsutherland (at) fluorofinder dot com.
